description: Friendly robotic AI voice, cheerful and upbeat but clearly synthetic. Clean digital tone with slight electronic warmth. Enthusiastic and helpful, like a machine that genuinely loves its friends. Gender neutral, medium pitch, precise enunciation with occasional playful inflection.
sample_text: Oh boy, friends! I have calculated a 97 percent chance that those guys are going to try and kill us. This is going to be so much fun!
